alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:35PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Blaine, southern Butte, west central Bingham and northeastern Minidoka Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 534 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Central Inl to 7 miles west of Southwest Inl to 11 miles south of Arco to 6 miles northwest of Craters Of The Moon. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and graupel. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Craters Of The Moon, Southwest Inl, Central Inl, Big Southern Butte and Coxs Well Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds
